price: Bendito seja o Nome de teu Senhor, Possuidor de majestade e honorabilidade!
arabic: تَبَٰرَكَ ٱسۡمُ رَبِّكَ ذِي ٱلۡجَلَٰلِ وَٱلۡإِكۡرَامِ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: tabāraka us'mu rabbika dhī al-jalāli wal-ik'rāmi
